text: == Events == === By place === ==== Africa ==== * The Banu Hilal take Kairouan. The Zirid dynasty has to move to Mahdiya. ==== Asia ==== * King Anawrahta of Burma takes over Thanton in northern Thailand, strengthening Theravada Buddhism in the country. ==== Europe ==== * King Macbeth of Scotland is killed in battle against Malcolm III of Scotland. He is replaced as King of Scotland by his stepson Lulach. * William the Conqueror defeats a Franco-Angevin army at the mouth of the Dives River, Normandy in the Battle of Varaville. * Ferdinand I of Castile takes Lamego and Viseu from Christian lords allied to the Muslim taifas. === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * August 2 - Pope Stephen IX (sometimes referred to as Stephen X) replaces Pope Victor II as the 154th pope. == Births == * Hugh I, Duke of Burgundy (d. 1093) == Deaths == * Jōchō, Japanese sculptor * March 1 - Ermesinde of Carcassonne, countess and regent of Barcelona (b. 972) * July 28 - Pope Victor II * August 15 - King Macbeth of Scotland * Late August - Edward the Exile, son of Edmund II of England * August 31 - Leofric, Earl of Mercia == References ==
